question: Which of the following is/are correct about Kinetic energy?
option1: Kinetic energy can be positive or negative
option2: Kinetic energy is independent of frame of reference
explanation: Kinetic energy of a body is half the product of mass of the body and square of the velocity of the body. K.E = 1/2(mv<sup>2</sup>) Kinetic energy depends on the frame of reference. Kinetic energy of a body is always positive.
